description: This file sets up and configures a Couchbase vector database, including index creation, environment setup, and integration with an AI agent for querying recipes from a PDF knowledge base.

classes.name: SearchIndex
classes.description: Defines the configuration for the Couchbase vector search index.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base loaded from a PDF URL, integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: CouchbaseSearch
classes.description: Encapsulates the Couchbase vector search functionality.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on a query.
